ABOUT HYBRID BAND
Amazing + Adaptable + Affordable
The New Sounds of South Florida available in Band sizes of 3, 6, and 9 musicians
.
The Hybrid Band
is a Unique and Modern mix of Live Musicians + DJ performing the best Top 40s-hits in the Charts covering any music format for any age and cultural group. It is recognized for their evocative beats and incomparable performance.
The Hybrid Band
can have: Singers + Horns + Percussion along with our Master DJ/Director to accommodate to any event size and budget. They can also learn any song requested out of their playlist to please you.
Please do not hesitate in
contacting their Team
to provide you availability, pricing, and guidance in developing a wow factor for your next event. They are available to travel Worldwide.
ASK NOW an
Instant Quote
to have them
assist you soon with the best of their experience and talent!
Powered by Junior’s Entertainment Group.
Alongside The Hybrid Band
, there are other services available for you such as
Ambiance Lighting
for a touch of warmth and elegance,
Strings Ensembles
(Wedding Ceremonies, Cocktails, Buffett, and Sit-down Dinners),
Jazz Ensembles
(Cocktails, Buffett, and Sit-down Dinners),
Internationally experienced DJ’s
with the largest music selection
,
Unique Themes
with a variety of Characters to enhance the Band or DJs performances,
Other Related Specialty Bands
with different styles for personalized music tastes,
Photo/Video Services
with its superb and talented Media Team,
Production
(
Staging
,
LED Dancefloors
and
Walls
,
LED DJ booths
,
Confetti Cannons
,
CO2 Cryo jets
,
Water-based haze effect
for stage and dancefloor, and
Fireworks
), and
Sound and Lights systems
for their Stage performances or any other clients’ needs.
The Hybrid Band
has performed for Private Events along
many famous mainstream artists such as: Camila Cabello, Post Malone, Shawn Mendes, Demi Lovato, Jason Derulo, Earth Wind and Fire, The Weeknd, Pitbull, Shakira, Bruno Mars, and Ed Sheeran among many others.
When you hire The Hybrid Band,
instead of choosing among semi-professionals on a directory site, or talking to a salesman at an agency, you will work one-on-one with Junior Antoniazzi (Owner/Lead Producer) and his Team—a dedicated life-long Music Guru for Private Events who takes pride on leading the South Florida Industry for more than 20 years by constantly reinventing themselves.  The Team carries a vast experience with more than 1000+ successfully customized events locally, nationally, and internationally like none other in the Event Industry.
Ask for an instant quote
The Process
Ask for an instant quote
(click here)
with all information requested to provide you availability and the Best Entertainment Options/Packages
After selecting your best options based upon your style and budget, you will receive an agreement and deposit payment instructions to reserve their services for your event date
Once the agreement/deposit payment process is completed, you will receive a Comprehensive Questionnaire for formalities (if any) and Demographic study, and a music selection guide for your choices
WHAT CLIENTS ARE SAYING!
Wow! Juniors Entertainment was the perfect fit for our wedding in Palm Beach, FL. From the ceremony, to cocktail hour, to reception - everything was perfect. I enjoyed both the live music and the music played by the DJ. Not to mention, the violinist was amazing during the ceremony - so beautiful. The band had great enthusiasm and got the guests excited to dance on the dancefloor. Their responsiveness during wedding planning was also a 10/10. Thank you for making a memorable wedding night!
(continue reading)
Amazing band for wedding!
Nikki Dunmire
Hiring Junior's Entertainment and the Ice Breakers Band was without doubt one of the best decisions we could have made for our wedding. They were truly phenomenal and absolutely blew everybody away from start to finish. All of our wedding guests could not stop talking about how amazing the band was. Junior was very friendly, accommodating, and communicative throughout the entire process (which included our April 2020 wedding date being canceled at the last minute).
(continue reading)
Best Decisions Ever!
NICK SHUMAN
Junior's has soooo many entertainment options to choose from and we are so happy we chose them to take care of ALL of the entertainment! We had our wedding in Naples, FL with their Ice Breakers Band. All I can say is WOW WOW WOW! They were fabulous! The singers were so IMPRESSIVE and fun! Everyone loved their dance choreography, the robots from the "hora ibiza", and the opera tenor at our ceremony. All of our 300 guests danced all night. Hands down, this is the best and most professional entertainment company out there.
(continue reading)
WOW WOW WOW!
Marilyn K Diaz
Why hire HYBRID BAND?
1 – The Hybrid Band
is NOT an Agency,
nor do they handle Club musicians and dancers but highly educated and trained talent and staff.
They produce and operate its own
Concept
to please your music taste.
2 – The Hybrid Band is an absolute investment
with 10+ years of Entertainment Experience customizing off-the charts events.
3 – Their Team will guide you throughout the process from beginning to the successful end.
Your production manager will send you a customized Entertainment Itinerary (02) weeks prior to your event detailing all to be executed as planned with you and for you like no-other Band/Company.
4 – The Hybrid Band is a 100% winning choice
due to its intangible high value of knowing-how-to. This is an effect that you may not see now but will feel later – a product of more than 200
Weddings
entertained locally, nationally, and globally.
5 – The Hybrid Band conducts their business practices ethically
and do not provide any commissions or kickbacks behind your knowledge to Event Planners or Venues.
They are fully insured
, and they will present their Certificate of Insurance upon request.
6 – They are one of the very few chosen as Exclusive Vendors of Entertainment
at
The
Breakers
and
Mar-a-lago
Palm Beach along 70 other amazing event venues throughout South Florida for all the other
reasons mentioned above.
Please do not hesitate in
contacting the Hybrid Band Team
to provide you availability, pricing, and guidance in developing a wow factor for your next event. They are available to travel Worldwide.
ASK NOW an
Instant Quote
to have them
assist you soon with the best of their experience and talent!
Previous
Next
